field_edited_text.value:
. 30





Time is running out. Truly this is a time of decision. Shall the Jones Falls Valley
continue to be a rubbish heap -- an object of catch-as-catch-can speculation and
abuse? Will we travel on the Jones Falls Expressway, past derelict factories with
bricked-up winddws, through a treeless landscape with billboards glaring at us from
every conceivable angle? Or will the Valley become, by one master stroke, a great
Valley Parkway, making travel on it--by expressway, by scenic road, by commuter
train, on foot--a pleasure and relief for the daily traveller? “To delay our decision

will mean that the opportunity will be lost forever. Jones Falls Valley must be saved!
